name: Jimmy's Cronicles
description:
The game contains blood/gore and mild language

An old game made with friends, when I was 13, my first complete project in RPG MAKER VX ACE (No reinventing the wheel, mostly just an RPG MAKER game)

You take control of Jimmy a heroic kid, who wants to beat up Calico an alien from outer space, as he has made tons of people assault each other, and caused chaos all over the place.

You will fight, avoid fires and find allies in your short venture.

The game is mostly in English but certain things were kept in Spanish.

The main artist is fuzzydip.
